description:
Keeta – The World’s Leading Food Delivery Service
Craving pizza, fried chicken, sushi, or something new? We’ve got you covered! Whether you’re in the mood for indulgent treats or healthy choices like fresh salads and light meals, Keeta delivers your favourites straight to your door. 

Why Choose Keeta?
1.Easy to Use – Order in seconds!
2.Daily Deals – Free delivery and discounts on every order!
3.Global Cuisines – Explore various tasty options.
4.On-time Promise – Your food arrives fresh and fast. 

How It Works:
1.Download Keeta and pick a restaurant.
2.Select your dishes and checkout.
3.Sit back and enjoy!

Food. Groceries. And more, delivered in minutes!
From your favorite takeout to daily essentials, Ninja is the fastest 24-hour restaurants and grocery delivery service you can count on at the price you want with the variety everyone’s looking for.

Shop better. Eat better. Live better.

Start off with a reward: Love gifts? Get FREE delivery on your first order!
5,000+ Restaurants: Order your favorite cuisine and treat yourself to our daily exclusive offers. 
15,000+ products to choose from: From old favorites and household staples to new restaurants and items you never knew existed, we’ve got it all. And more!
24/7 deliveries: Whether you’re an early bird or night owl, our round-the-clock delivery service will give you what you want when you want it.  
Coffee, tea  & more: Get your daily dose of caffeine delivered and choose from our refreshingly fresh juices, sodas and more. 
Follow your order from the get-go: Track it all from the source to your front door in real time.  
Faster than you can say Ninja: We have our very own riders who’ll  deliver whatever  you order in 30 minutes (or less).
Tap into budget-friendly buys: We’ve got what you want  at the price tag you love! 
Paying is a breeze: We accept all major debit and credit cards and various other payments depending on your location. 

Your favorite cuisines delivered in minutes
5,000+ restaurants choices
Exclusive daily offers on what you crave 

One tap gets you the fastest delivery of grocery! Our diverse product range includes:

Food & drink 
►	Beverages & refreshments: Coffees, teas, juices and a range of mineral water brands.
►	Fresh foods & freshly baked: Fresh meats, poultry, fruits, veggies, bread and baked goods.
►	Dairy & frozen foods: Milk, eggs, cheese, ice creams and frozen meals.
►	Pantry supplies: Oil, flour, pasta, rice, grains and other culinary must-haves. 
►	Health-centric choices: Variety of nutritious and organic snacks, nuts, seeds and more.

Home & you 
►	Baby things: Baby formula, food and care products plus diapers, wipes and more.
►	Beauty Corner: Lenses, lashes, nails, perfumes and specialized skincare and makeup products. 
►	Home cleaning: Cleaning supplies, laundry products and other household staples.
►	Personal care: Personal hygiene, skincare and wellness products.
►	Lifestyle essentials: Electronics and mobile accessories, toys, stationary and other necessary knick knacks. 
►	Fitness center: Protein shakes and bars, gym gear, supplements and other essentials for gym bodies. 
►	Pet care: Nutritious food, toys, grooming products and more for dogs, cats and more.

We’re anywhere you are
Well, that’s the aim! Ninja launched in Saudi Arabia – covering the entire country - and has expanded  its super fast grocery delivery services to Qatar, Bahrain and soon, the  remaining GCC. The reason why we’re doing this? Like you, we like to get things done fast and right. And nothing beats getting delicious food and high-quality buys at lightning speed. 

Experience Ninja for yourself. Download the Ninja App now and get a FREE delivery on your first order!

True Essence of Coffee Culture


Welcome to Caribou Coffee Kuwait, your go-to coffee destination for a seamless and rewarding experience! Whether you're in the mood for a quick pickup or convenient curbside service, Caribou has you covered. Our app is designed with you in mind, providing a one-stop solution for all your caffeine cravings, right at your fingertips.

Key Features:

Choose Your Convenience


Select your preferred way to enjoy Caribou's tempting offers. Order ahead and swing by for a speedy pickup, or stay in your car and enjoy our curbside service. The choice is yours!

User-Friendly Interface


Our user-friendly app ensures a hassle-free ordering experience. Browse our menu with ease, customize your order, and securely pay within a few taps. Save your favorite orders for quick reordering and track the progress of your order in real-time.

Enjoy It Your Way


Choose your preferred Caribou beverages and snacks or any of our other exciting products as you wish. Select the size/volume, flavor, and consistency according to your preference. The application will also let you choose any add-ons available for a product. Order ahead and swing by for a speedy pickup, or stay in your car and enjoy our curbside service. The choice is yours!


Permission-Based Store Locator


Find the nearest Caribou in Kuwait with our integrated store locator. Our user-friendly app works best with your permissions to show you the nearest outlet along with the products available. Even if permissions are disabled, the application will let you search for stores manually. No matter where you are, we're never too far away. Plan your visit, order, and enjoy your favorite Caribou beverages and snacks.

Safe and Secure Transactions


Your security is our top priority. Our mobile application is designed with advanced encryption and secure payment options, so you can place your orders with confidence and peace of mind.

Stay Updated


Get the latest news, promotions, and special offers delivered right to your device. Never miss out on limited-time deals or exciting new menu items.

Experience the future of convenient dining with Caribou Kuwait! Download our app now and discover the ultimate way to enjoy your favorite coffee, snacks, and more. Satisfy your cravings and indulge in a world of flavor.

Don't wait - join the Caribou community today and make every order an experience to remember.

developer: Talabat General Trading and Contracting Company
description:
Hey! Looking for the quickest food delivery? That’s easy with our new talabat app.

Whether you want a pizza, burger or groceries, choose from thousands of markets and restaurants in your city and put your hunger to an end. We’ve got it all – fast delivery, unlimited options, easy online payment and vouchers all at your fingertips.

Order your favorite food and get it delivered to wherever you are, but also get your groceries delivered to you with more cities to come. Your needs, done - simply download our app, choose your food or groceries and pay in a few taps via card or cash upon delivery. 

Browse a multitude of restaurant menus and order from countless stores. With our filters and smart search functions, you can find the exact menu or product you want in no time, available to personalize at your request.

"Pay online or in cash"
Add info to your account on our new talabat app to speed up your order process. Pay in cash or save card details to pay online, reorder your favorites anytime and save addresses so you’re ready for delivery wherever you are. Like planning ahead? Pick what time you want us to deliver to avoid hunger kicking in.

"Track your order from start to finish"
That’s right; follow your delivery from the moment it’s confirmed to the second we hand it to you. With notifications, you'll always be updated and our help center will answer any questions about your delivery – we’ve got you.

"Find exclusive deals"
Downloading the talabat app makes you a part of our fam. We’re more than food delivery; discover vouchers, promotions and deals and treat yourself to that midweek pizza or Friday night burger more often. By opting in for notifications, we'll also share new restaurants, supermarkets and stores in your area, so you’ll never miss out on the latest offers again.

Find us in Kuwait, the United Arab Emirates, Bahrain, Oman, Qatar, Jordan, the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia and Egypt.

Happy ordering.

Meal Plans: Our app serves as a meal planner, providing daily, weekly, and monthly meal subscriptions according to your needs.  

الباقات: تطبيقنا يعمل كمخطط للوجبات، حيث يقدم اشتراكات يومية، أسبوعية، وشهرية حسب احتياجاتك 

 Healthy Food: Discover a wide range of healthy food options, complete with pictures and nutritional information, before making your selection.  

طعام صحي: اكتشف مجموعة واسعة من خيارات الطعام الصحي، مع صور ومعلومات غذائية، قبل اتخاذ قرارك 

 
Choose Your Meals: Easily select your favorite meals for the week or month.  

اختر وجباتك: يمكنك بسهولة اختيار وجباتك المفضلة للأسبوع أو الشهر 

 
Manage Your Subscription: Keep track of your subscription status, including start and end dates, all in one place.  

إدارة اشتراكك: تابع حالة اشتراكك، بما في ذلك تاريخ البدء والانتهاء، كل ذلك في مكان واحد 

 
Food Variations: Choose from a variety of keto, diet, lifestyle, bodybuilding, weight loss food that fit your dietary preferences and health goals, all available through the Dietbux app.  

تنوع الأطعمة: اختر من مجموعة متنوعة من خيارات الكيتو، والحمية، ونمط الحياة، وبناء الأجسام، وفقدان الوزن التي تناسب تفضيلاتك الغذائية وأهدافك الصحية، جميعها متاحة من خلال تطبيق  دايت بوكس 

 
Pause Subscription: If you need a break, you can pause your subscription anytime.  

إيقاف الاشتراك: إذا كنت بحاجة إلى استراحة، يمكنك إيقاف اشتراكك في أي وقت 

 
⁠Change Meals Anytime: Flexibility to switch out your meals based on your cravings or dietary needs.  

تغيير الوجبات في أي وقت: مرونة لتغيير وجباتك بناءاً على شهيتك 

 
Allergy/Dislikes Notes: Add notes about any allergies to ensure your meals are safe for your condition and your preferences.  

ملاحظات الحساسية و الأطعمة الغير محببة: أضف ملاحظات حول أي حساسية لضمان أن وجباتك آمنة لك او حسب تفضيلك 

 
⁠Meal Evaluations: Rate and evaluate your meals to help others choose the best options.  

تقييم الوجبات: قم بتقييم وجباتك لمساعدة الآخرين في اختيار أفضل الخيارات 

 
⁠Contact Service Center: Easily reach out to our service center for any questions or support. 

الاتصال بمركز الخدمة: تواصل بسهولة مع مركز الخدمة لدينا لأي استفسارات أو دعم

Your favorite convenience store, Trolley just got online, find more than 5,000the newest and freshest to-go snacks, your favorite drinks and beauty and health essentials and so much more!
SECURE PAYMENTS:
Add your favorite items to the cart and confirm it with the most secure payment methods available within the app.
DELIVERY:

CONTACT US:

developer: Jahez International Information Systems Technology Company Limited Liability
description:
The Easiest and Fastest food delivery service in Saudi Arabia. 

Jahez is a Saudi app that specializes in online food delivery, and is covering more than 54 cities across Saudi. 

Your favorite meal is few steps away, when your feeling hungry just order, choose locate your address, and the receipt will show up next with the total price, you can pay seamlessly through Apple Pay or any other payment you like, Once the order is accepted you can live track it. 
Proudly the estimate delivery time is a record break 30 mins, that's because 98% of your order process is automated.

Because quality is our standard, we at Jahez are determined to provide a unique customer experience through fast delivery, payment options, continuous service developments, and the variety of restaurants.

Calo takes the guesswork out of healthy eating by analyzing your nutritional needs through our nutritionist-approved algorithm, then matching you with chef-crafted meals tailored to your body, fitness goals, and taste preferences. Fast & Fresh: Your meals are freshly prepared and ready within 2 hours, delivered daily for ultimate convenience. Goal-Driven Nutrition: Whether you’re looking to lose weight, maintain, or build muscle, Calo provides the perfect balance of macros and flavours to keep you on track. Total Flexibility: Pause, swap meals, or adjust your daily calories anytime—your plan, your way. Smart Integration: Sync with your health apps to track progress effortlessly. With HealthKit integration, Calo uses your fitness activity to fine-tune meal predictions, ensuring you get the most suitable, performance-driven meals every time.
Healthy eating has never been easier. Let Calo fuel your goals—deliciously and effortlessly.

The Starbucks Kuwait App is the easiest way for you to order ahead for pickup and earn Stars every time you purchase your Starbucks favourites - beverage, food, coffee-at-home products, and merchandise at our stores or in-app*.

With every purchase in-app or in-store of your favourite Starbucks food, beverages and Starbucks® merchandise, watch Stars add up towards Free Drinks and special benefits. Get exclusive Rewards member offers sent directly to your inbox. Conveniently find your nearest Starbucks store and view your transaction history with just a tap.

Enhance your Starbucks experience, all on your Starbucks Kuwait app.

Getting rewarded with Stars is super easy. Here’s how you can get started:

• Download the Starbucks Kuwait app and register
• When in store, Scan the QR code on your app every time you make a purchase at any participating Starbucks store in Kuwait to collect Stars; you get 4 Stars for every 1 KD spent!
• View your collected Stars on the home screen of your app
• Redeem Stars across 5 different tiers of Rewards, including drinks, food, and merchandise, starting from 150 Stars.
• More Stars unlock the world of Gold Membership, with free birthday drink and premium offers galore.

Skip the queues and order ahead directly from the App
• Select your store of choice
• Choose your menu items
• Customise to your liking
• Pay on the app and checkout
• Head on to your chosen store and pick up your order
• Collecting Stars? Don’t worry! Rewards are built in, so you’ll earn Stars with every purchase

Don’t miss out, be a part of the Starbucks coffee club – Download the Starbucks Kuwait app now!
*Starbucks Kuwait app is available for use only at participating Starbucks Stores across Kuwait.

Welcome to the PRET Mobile App—the ultimate coffee experience at your fingertips!

Personalized Experience: Take our onboarding quiz for custom coffee recommendations that match your unique taste.
Seamless Services: Enjoy convenient pickup, office delivery, or doorstep delivery to suit your busy lifestyle.
Tiered Rewards System: Earn points with every purchase and unlock exclusive perks as you climb the tiers.
Play & Earn: Have fun with in-app games and earn rewards while you play.
Digital Wallet: Top up your wallet and enjoy faster checkouts.
Gift Cards: Send love to friends and family with easy-to-use gift cards.

PRET makes your coffee journey simple, rewarding, and fun. Download now and start exploring your perfect brew today!

Choice is a meal delivery app that connects users with restaurants offering healthy meals, making healthy eating easy and affordable. Our goal is to change perceptions of what healthy eating means and support our customers in maintaining a balanced lifestyle. We want to help people develop a logical approach to healthy eating, one that can be sustained until making smart food choices becomes a way of life.

By partnering with restaurants in the culinary industry that specialize in healthy meals, we provide our customers with fresh, delicious, low-calorie, and nutritionally balanced meals that complement their healthy-lifestyle goals. We’re constantly working to improve our performance and services to provide healthy, low-calorie meals. To do this, we need your input. We want your ideas, feedback, even your complaints.

To help keep the conversation going, we’ve created several channels to make it easier for you to communicate with us. You can send us an email or contact us through the app. We are always available and ready to listen.

Disclaimer: Choice connects users with healthy-meal restaurants and does not provide medical or nutritional advice. For personalised guidance, please consult a qualified professional.

The all new KFC Kuwait App is the fastest way to order your favorite KFC chicken online. Ordering food within a few clicks has never been so easy. Pick up the food or get it delivered at your doorstep, have food the way you like.

At KFC, we believe in real cooks, freshly-prepared good food and unrelenting quality control. Our aim is to take convenience to a whole new level and want you to have your favorite chicken options sitting at home.

*Get started and order in minimum steps: 

1. Download the app
2. Choose a preferred mode of language
3. Check your favorite items categorized as part of the menu
4. Add items to the cart
5. Log in to use Saved Addresses or continue as Guest
6. Choose a mode of ordering as pickup or delivery
7. Select location and provide a delivery address/pickup address
8. Proceed to checkout and make payment
9. Track your order and get it delivered as lightning fast delivery
10. Enjoy the food delivered at your doorstep. 

Why you should use KFC App:
*Pickup: 
When driving, pickup your delicious food from any nearest store by ordering from the application.   

*Car Hop:
100% Contactless and hassle-free experience. For our customers, we bring Car Hop service for contactless delivery in your car parked in our premises.

*Late night delivery: 
Late night hunger options. Look no further and simply order food online from KFC & we’ll rush to you with delicious chicken items even at 3 AM. This is available at select locations only.

*Social Login:
Why spent time in the login process when it can be done via social mode. Use your Google or Facebook or Apple account to login with ease.

*Hassle-free payments:
With multiple payment options (including Cash on Delivery, Online payments like Credit/Debit Cards etc.) at your fingertips, it’s now easier than ever to pay for your order. 

*Full KFC Menu: Order from the range of options - KFC Zinger box, Twister box, Mozzarella Burger Box, Meals, KFC buckets & more. Enjoy from a wide range of Chicken burgers, sandwiches, buckets & meals!


*Special Offers:
Coupons, Offers & deals customized only for you so that you can order more and get rewarded at times you order. 

*Have any feedback or queries?
KFC’s customer care is happy to help! Call us at - 1888666 or drop a mail to apps@americana-food.com
For more details, log into https://kuwait.kfc.me/

Welcome to the new official McDonald’s app.

The app is filled with great offers specially tailored to you. Deals and discounts appear regularly so check back often to see what’s new.

The news section keeps you up to date with everything that’s going on in McDonald’s near you. Look here for new games and competitions.

The nutrition section provides information on our entire menu. We provide allergy advice and nutritional information on everything from the Big Mac to a single dip!

Use our restaurant finder to find your nearest McDonald’s. Filter your search based on opening hours, facilities and get directions from wherever you are.
V-Thru is a new smart way to order things. V-Thru brings the drive-thru experience to all of your favorite stores. Ordering with V-Thru is easier, faster and safer.

Hardee’s Kuwait food app is now available on your fingertips. Ordering food online has never been this exciting. Indulge in our 100% Angus beef thickburger, chargrilled burgers, beef sandwiches & more from the comfort of your home. Avail tempting deals and offers now at the Hardee's restaurant near you.



Do not miss out on our meals, combos & deals!. If you are on the go, takeaway your favorite meal by visiting our nearby restaurant. Go all in with our delightful food offers at Hardee’s and have a great time with your family and friends. 



Hardee's Kuwait understands the current situation and the need to be home and safe. You can call now on our Hardee's contact number or download our Hardee's Kuwait app today to enjoy delicious thickburgers, cheese burgers, steak & more from the comfort of your home!



Just a few taps away from ordering your favorites, Follow the below steps.

1. Download the Hardee’s Kuwait App.
2. Choose the preferred language based on preference.
3. Check your favorite items categorized as part of the menu.
4. Add your wish list to the cart.
5. Log in to use your saved addresses or continue as a Guest.
6. Choose a mode of ordering as takeaway or delivery.
7 Select your location and provide delivery address.
8. Proceed to check out and make payment                                                                                 9. Track your order and enjoy quick delivery.
10. Relish the food delivered at your doorstep.        
                                                                                                                

Why use our Food Delivery App:

*Exclusive Hardee’s Menu
Order from the variety of choices - Angus Thickburgers, burger meal deals, Chicken Burgers, sides, desserts & beverages. Enjoy from a wide array of Chicken & Beef burgers, sandwiches and much more!



Our Top-sellers:
• Angus Thickburgers®
• Chargrilled burgers
• Chicken Burgers
• Angus beef sandwiches
• Delicious Philly cheese steak & fillet burger
• Choice of sides, desserts & beverages.
• Varieties of kid’s meals.
• Value Meals.

*Personalized Food Cart: 

Customize your burgers, sandwiches, sides, desserts, or combos with a wide variety of condiment and add-on options.


*Order History: 
We remember all your orders, you can now view and make your pick from a list of your favorite product shortlisted and customized.


*Easy payments:
Paying online has never been so hassle free, with multiple payment options (including Cash on Delivery, online payments like (Credit/Debit Cards etc.) at your fingertips. 


*Exciting Offers: 
Get exclusive Hardee’s Coupons, Offers & Deals customized only for you so it leaves you wanting for more and get rewarded at the time of you order. Choose from variety of burger meals & deals on combos & feast today!

*Track your orders: 
Get notified and know your order status LIVE on the app without the hassle of calling.
 
*My Account:
Why spent time on multiple Apps when a single food delivery App can sort you in many ways. Follow our login process which now can be done via a social mode. Use your Google or Facebook or Apple account to log in our App.

*Have any feedback or queries?
Hardee's customer care is happy to help you! Call us at +(965) 1888333, For more details, please log into https://www.hardees.com.kw

Hungry? Get your favourite meals, takeaways and groceries delivered to your door in minutes with Deliveroo. From local gems to big-name brands, discover thousands of restaurants and supermarkets near you.

ALL YOUR FAVOURITES, DELIVERED:

- Restaurants: Big brands and local gems
- Grocery: Always fresh with our Freshness Promise
- Convenience: Beauty essentials, flowers, gifts, DIY and more in minutes

Order from the restaurants you’re craving...

- Sushi or pizza?
- A Chinese or Indian?
- Burgers, pasta, breakfast or something sweet?

All of your favourites are just a tap away from top brands like KFC, McDonald’s, Burger King, Subway, Nando’s, Wagamama, Popeyes, Papa John’s, Wingstop, Giggling Squid, Kokoro, Pizza Express, Five Guys, Franco Manca, Dishoom, Pho, Taco Bell, Starbucks, Gail's Bakery, Joe & the Juice, GBK and more!

Or Fancy something different? Discover thousands of local gems that deliver right to your door.

£0 DELIVERY FEE WITH DELIVEROO PLUS

Become a member and you’ll also unlock:

- Exclusive offers and member-only deals
- Monthly rewards that help your money go further
- Discounted service fees*
- Earn 10% back on restaurant orders over £30*

*Plus Gold members only

It’s the simplest way to save while enjoying what you love most.

SUPERMARKETS SORTED

Get groceries delivered fast from top supermarkets, including Waitrose, ASDA, Morrisons, M&S, Sainsbury’s, Co-Op, Amazon Fresh, Whole Foods, Spar, One Stop, Iceland and Majestic Wine.

MORE THAN FOOD

We’re here for the everyday essentials and little treats too. From Boots and Healf to Not On The High Street, B&Q, Screwfix, Accessorize and The Perfume Shop, we've got you covered.

WHY CHOOSE DELIVEROO?

- Track every order live from kitchen to doorstep
- Enjoy fast, reliable delivery when it matters
- Order for right now or schedule for later
- Pick up deals you won’t find anywhere else

Download the app today and let us bring the best of your neighbourhood straight to your door.

T&Cs apply. Visit the website for full details.

Livelong is your ultimate healthy food delivery platform, designed to make nutritious eating simple, delicious, and accessible. We deliver a wide range of flavorful, healthy meals straight to your doorstep in less than 30 minutes.

Our curated menu features meals from trusted vendors, crafted with precise macro calculations to meet your dietary needs. Whether you’re aiming to lose weight, build muscle, or maintain a balanced lifestyle, Livelong helps you stay on track without compromising on taste, speed, or convenience.

developer: CIRCLE UNITED GENERAL TRADING CO. WLL
description:
From the beginning, we've been more than a delivery service; Circle is your go to for everything essential — Select from over 10,000+ items from grocery, bakery, coffee, beauty and hygiene products, and more, all delivered in less than 20 minutes, thanks to our network of dark-stores and swift last-mile service. Circle has become a symbol of efficiency and speed.




Circle - Groceries & More in 15 Minutes!


Circle is a highly efficient delivery service with a diverse selection of products delivered to your doorstep in just 15 minutes. Select from over 10,000+ items available in its extensive catalog, from fresh produce, snacks, and ready - made meals, to beverages, household essentials, personal and baby care items, and even pet food. You can also enjoy an array of special offers and discounts with our in-app promotions and coupons.


Circle is there for your late-night cravings, for a last minute grocery while you plan to unleash your inner home-chef on a weekend, for a quick cold brew coffee to get you through your mornings!
With Circle, you can order from your app and get your items delivered to your location within minutes.


Why Circle?
With Circle, we bring your groceries to your doorstep in just minutes, whether it's day or night, and at prices comparable to your local grocery store, with a free delivery, making the whole process even better. You can choose from over 10,000+ products across a wide range of products from popular brands you would find in your regular supermarket, ensuring that you're fully covered.





The categories of products we deliver:
► Fruits & Vegetables
► Bakery
► Dairy & Eggs
► Meat & Fish
► Deli 
► Beverages
► Ice Cream
► Breakfast
► Frozen
► Sweets & Snacks
► Vegan & Vegetarian
► Baby Products
► Toiletries
► Household Items
► Pet essentials








Smooth experience


Say goodbye to substitutions, too, our inventory is updated in real-time, ensuring you receive precisely what you ordered without substitutions. 
Circle’s delivery service is also contact-free to help you stay safe.
No more waiting in long grocery lines because we value your time.
No more wasting time stocking your fridge, as your groceries will arrive in minutes. 




We are faster


With our large network of mini stores where our riders pack your order, we ensure a fast and efficient delivery. Although speed is our mission, safety is key, our delivery riders are trained to follow traffic rules and ensure prompt and secure delivery of groceries. 
How to get the app
Simply download the Circle app, place an order, and enjoy lightning-fast delivery. Plus, Circle offers in-app promotions and coupons, making it an even more cost-effective option. 
Enjoy a discount on your first delivery and join the Circle family today!

developer: CTT Wholesale and Retail Trading Company

Our mission is to make healthy eating convenient, accessible, and budget-friendly without compromising on quality or taste. Enjoy expertly crafted meals delivered straight to your door and experience the perfect balance of health 
and value. 


“دايت فاليو” هي خدمة اشتراك مميزة للوجبات الصحية، مكرسة لتقديم وجبات لذيذة ومغذية بأسعار معقولة. مهمتنا هي جعل تناول الطعام الصحي سهلاً ومتاحاً وبأسعار تناسب الجميع دون المساومة على الجودة أو المذاق. استمتع بوجبات معدة باحتراف تُوصَل مباشرة إلى باب منزلك لتجربة التوازن المثالي بين الصحة والقيمة.

“دايت فاليو” هي خدمة اشتراك مميزة للوجبات الصحية، مكرسة لتقديم وجبات لذيذة ومغذية بأسعار معقولة. مهمتنا هي جعل تناول الطعام الصحي سهلاً ومتاحاً وبأسعار تناسب الجميع دون المساومة على الجودة أو المذاق. استمتع بوجبات معدة باحتراف تُوصَل مباشرة إلى باب منزلك لتجربة التوازن المثالي بين الصحة والقيمة.

MOBILE ORDERING
Order your BK® favorites to be delivered to your doorstep -- or fly past the line for fast-and-easy take out and car pickup.  And now, you can order even faster with quick reorder! 

REWARDS
Get the royal treatment when you use the app! Be sure to sign in to earn Crowns with every order. Then redeem your Crowns for free food and drinks at participating BURGER KING® restaurants across Kuwait.

COUPONS
Tap into instant savings with your mobile coupons. We refresh coupons frequently, so the deals never get old.

DELIVERY TRACKING
No wondering about when your delivery order will arrive. We’ll keep you posted on your delivery’s progress every step of the way.

FIND YOUR BK®
Locate your nearest BURGER KING® restaurant and never leave those flame-grilled cravings unfulfilled.

A variety of freshly made healthy meals and snacks that match your daily needs. Every dish of ours is precisely counted based on what your body needs. We offer a variety of cuisines to provide our customers numerous choices. Healthy eating does not always have to be boring. With the delicious meals, snacks, and desserts we provide, your goal is just one click away!

SEE THE WORLD THROUGH COFFEE
 
% Arabica App has been specially brewed to reward your loyalty.

HungerStation – The First and Biggest Delivery App in Saudi Arabia

Whatever you need, HungerStation delivers it to you before anyone else. From your favorite restaurants, groceries, and pharmacies, to gifts and flowers. Our coverage reaches over 102 cities and regions across the Kingdom, with more than 55,000 restaurants and stores ready to serve you anytime.

Why HungerStation?
Because we’re the largest in Saudi Arabia: more than 55,000 restaurants and stores at your fingertips.

Variety that matches your cravings: whether it’s Pizza, Shawarma, Sushi, Sandwiches, Fresh Salad, Fast Food, Ice Cream, Coffee, Bakery treats, Japanese dishes, or authentic Arabic meals, you’ll always find what you’re looking for. Plus, you can enjoy international cuisines, traditional favorites, healthy options, organic products, and more.

Not just restaurants!

HungerStation Market: groceries, fresh fruits and vegetables, and cleaning products.

Pharmacies: from medicine to daily personal care.

Flowers & Gifts: want to surprise someone? Order now and we’ll deliver their gift wherever they are.

Payment your way: cash, card, or Apple Pay.

Daily deals & discounts tailored for you.

HungerStation Plus: unlimited free delivery from over 35,000 restaurants, stores, and pharmacies.

How to order? Just 4 easy steps:
1- Download the HungerStation app and set your location.
2- Choose a restaurant or store you like.
3- Browse the menu and add your favorites to the cart.
4- Order and relax, your order is on the way.
